metadata.title: CVE-2017-15736 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability (stored) in SPIP before 3.1.7 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string, as demonstrated by a PGP field, related to prive/objets/contenu/auteur.html and ecrire/inc/texte_mini.php.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-4').
